summary: REQ-8 appears implemented by adding a fixed-width (1000px) override for `html, body` inside `@media print` in `frontend/src/index.css`. REQ-9 is not evidenced in the diff because no report print view/root container files were modified to ensure consistent application of the shared print root class or to remove/mitigate responsive breakpoint behavior during printing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit all report print render paths and ensure each reportâ€™s printable root container opts into the shared print styles so the fixed-width print override applies consistently (Resident Profile Report, MAR Report, ADL Report, and any other report print views already present).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows changes to global CSS and metadata/summary files; there is no evidence of updates to the actual report print view components to apply a shared printable root class or to address responsive Tailwind breakpoint usage in print templates.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified global dialog overlay/content styling to force solid white, fully opaque Radix dialog overlays/content.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about print fixed-width layout across reports and does not request changes to dialog overlay/content styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Defined explicit printed page settings (`@page { size: letter; margin: 0.5in; }`).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on locking print viewport width via `html`/`body` fixed width and centering; it does not request setting paper size or page margins.
